question: What is the main objective of the ‘Jalsathi’ program launched in Odisha?
option2: To secure the underground water storage
option3: To save the Mahanadi river from pollution
option4: To create reservoir for rain water storage
explanation: The main objective of the ‘Jalsathi’ program is to supply safe drinking water to all households of Odisha. The Government appointed Jalsathis (Volunteers), who will work as the link between the consumers and the Public Health Engineering Organisation or the Water Corporation of Odisha.
